        public List<double[]> getPointList(STUtils.STStereoTrack.VIEW view)
        Get list of points that would be used in a simple univariate regression. Note that one STUtils.STStereoTrack.VIEW uses the path length.
        Parameters:
        view - - STUtils.STStereoTrack.VIEW to be obtained
        Returns:
        List of points for this track.
